name: completions(forPartialWordRange:in:language:inSpellDocumentWithTag:)
desc: Provides a list of complete words that the user might be trying to type based on a partial word in a given string.
declaration:
func completions(forPartialWordRange range: NSRange, 
              in string: String, 
        language: String?, 
inSpellDocumentWithTag tag: Int) -> [String]?
